subject: Re: [junit] testing my program
msgSnippet: ...  for a code smell detector (in case you don t already know it) for the library of classes, you can take the Apache Jakarta/XML projects
messageBody:
> Im am doing a fourth year project on a code smell detector. i want to
> be able to test it on quite a large library of java files approx 300-
> 500 classes
> Can anyone point me in the right direction.

<http://pmd.sf.net> for a code smell detector (in case you don't already
know it)

for the library of classes, you can take the Apache Jakarta/XML projects
(about 900Klines).

> In a way i don't want a library that has been out there too long.

Some Apache projects are very mature (Tomcat, Cocoon) other not.

hth

-Vladimir
